bwwExcerpt: “Succession” breakout Kieran Culkin joins “Better Call Saul” star Bob Odenkirk and comedian Bill Burr in a crackling, non-showy and well-balanced production that opened Monday at the Palace Theatre.The trio will likely get a standing ovation every night, but it’s the casting that really sings. None of the leads are outside their comfort zones.
